location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Instructions from Lewis Pelly, Agent Governor General and Special Commissioner, Baroda to Frederick Segrave

mods.abstract: The instructions inform Frederick Harboard Segrave that once he has met the Maharajah of Jeypore [Jaipur] at the Railway Station the following day he is to focus his attention on witnesses.His responsibilities will be to make available any witnesses that Henry Cleveland requests and to remain with the solicitors during interviews with witnesses unless otherwise instructed by Cleveland.
